title: The Skill of Dragon Breaking the Nine Heavens - Novel Updates
tags: Cultivation   Doctors   Male Protagonist   Medical Knowledge   Military   Poisons   Revenge   Second Chance
author: 柳枫
description: As a doctor, one should have a merciful heart and save the dying and injured at any costs. As a master of poisons, one is supposed to be vicious and cruel, with millions of people falling victim to his poisons. Bai Yuzhe, a miracle-working doctor and master of poisons,was hunted down by numerous people because he got a book with the record of Heaven-level cultivation skills. At the cost of his elder brother's life, he was able to have a rebirth. He swore to rise to the top and avenge his brother's death! What he wasn't able to possess in his last life would be regained by all means!>
